::Spears::
She smiled and kissed Prebon one last time.  "I'll make you happy, my 
master."

She waited as Ignatius take her and march her up the hill.

She waited until Prebon had finished talking, then she started on her 
part. She screamed, "LET ME GO! YOU SLAGGING WALKING PEICES OF SCRAP 
METAL! LET ME GO!"  She struggled and twisted, "OUCH! YOUR HURTING 
ME! STOP! LET ME GO!"  She struggled and cried out.  She glared at 
Prebon and Ignatius. "CREEPS! LET ME GO!"

She cried and screamed in pain and agony.

The chip still had complete control of her and she played her part to 
the fullest.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> 
> Trainers
> 
> "Alrigh than," said Prebon, kissing Spears one more time," 
Remember, 
> be brave. Nothing bad is going to happen today. JUst do your best 
and 
> I'll be happy."
> 
> Hammer and Ignatius grabbed Spears' arm and forced her up the hill, 
> with Prebon following. When they got there they could see a group 
of 
> Maxis talking. Time to make demands.
> 
> "Hey, which one of you is Ramulus? I am Prebon, leader of the 
> Trainers. I have one simple demand! Meet me alone, one on one, and 
> bring a map of all bases on this planet. I will than release both 
of 
> my prisoners! I have already removed the chip from your bot Spears 
> here. Look at her scream. Agree to my demands or they will die and 
> you will have an eternal enemy of Savage and The Trainers!"
>
